caption.p: Comparison of influenza vaccine effectiveness (VE) estimated using influenza (FLU)-negative controls (VE FLU−) with VE estimated using other/another respiratory virus (ORV)-positive controls (VE ORV+) (A) and comparison of VE estimated using influenza-negative controls (VE FLU−) with VE estimated using panel (PAN)-negative controls (VE PAN−) (B) from all available VE estimates. Dotted lines represent the identity line. Ninety-five percent confidence intervals are shown in gray (point estimates and lower confidence limits below −110% are not shown).
